Help:Node.title: Command Usage: !people
Help:Node.Log:Description:
COMMAND USAGE: !people
EXAMPLE: !people
Lists all the people in currently in the game, organized by location. This is very similar to the !hotspots commands, but it lists more information--namely the names of the people in each room.
SEE ALSO: !customers, !hotspots, !infoline, !whereis
